title: Artificial Intelligence

definitions.Artificial Intelligence: AI is the simulation of human intelligence processes by computer systems
definitions.Machine Learning: A method of data analysis that automates analytical model building
definitions.Deep Learning: A subset of machine learning that uses neural networks with multiple layers

formulas: AI = Intelligence + Machine Learning + Deep Learning
summary: The slide provides an overview of Artificial Intelligence, including its definition and its components such as Machine Learning and Deep Learning. It also includes a formula that combines these elements.
